channel.title: Bones to Bananas and Bones to Peaches Help!
channel.description:
Hello Mopar! Im trying to add bones to bananas and bones to peaches but i always get this error.
clickingMost.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame126("You need a magic level of 15 to cast bones to bananas", 357); ^ clickingMost.java:91: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame164(356); ^ clickingMost.java:94: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(526,1)) { ^ clickingMost.java:95: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client c.sendMessage("You don't have any bones!"); ^ clickingMost.java:98: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,1) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,2)) { ^ clickingMost.java:98: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,1) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,2)) { ^ clickingMost.java:98: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,1) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,2)) { ^ clickingMost.java:99: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame126("You do not have the correct runes to cast this spell.", 357); ^ clickingMost.java:100: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame164(356); ^ clickingMost.java:103: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(561, 1); ^ clickingMost.java:104: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 2); ^ clickingMost.java:105: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(555, 2); ^ clickingMost.java:106: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().addSkillXP(40,6); ^ clickingMost.java:108: cannot find symbol symbol : method gfx100(int) location: class client c.gfx100(141); ^ clickingMost.java:110: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem(526,1); ^ clickingMost.java:111: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().addItem(1963,1); ^ clickingMost.java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client } while (c.getItems().playerHasItem(526,1)); ^ clickingMost.java:116: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame126("You need a magic level of 60 to cast bones to peaches.", 357); ^ clickingMost.java:117: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame164(356); ^ clickingMost.java:120: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(526,1)) { ^ clickingMost.java:121: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client c.sendMessage("You don't have any bones!"); ^ clickingMost.java:124: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,4) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,4)) { ^ clickingMost.java:124: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,4) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,4)) { ^ clickingMost.java:124: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(561,2) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,4) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,4)) { ^ clickingMost.java:125: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame126("You do not have the correct runes to cast this spell.", 357); ^ clickingMost.java:126: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().sendFrame164(356); ^ clickingMost.java:129: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(561, 2); ^ clickingMost.java:130: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 4); ^ clickingMost.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem2(555, 4); ^ clickingMost.java:132: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class client c.getPA().addSkillXP(40,6); ^ clickingMost.java:134: cannot find symbol symbol : method gfx100(int) location: class client c.gfx100(311); ^ clickingMost.java:136: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().deleteItem(526,1); ^ clickingMost.java:137: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client c.getItems().addItem(6883,1); ^ clickingMost.java:138: cannot find symbol symbol : method getItems() location: class client } while (c.getItems().playerHasItem(526,1)); ^ 34 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated! Thank you Mopar!

item.title: Bones to Bananas and Bones to Peaches Help!
item.dc:creator: @Jk0K Jk0K
item.description:
@Jk0K wrote:

if you are using a PI (project insanity) server add this meathod in client.java (server sided)

	public PlayerAssistant getPA() {
		return playerAssistant;
	}

(edit)

you might not be using project insanity by some errors so you may need to convert the codes since thos are project insanity formats

Read full topic
item.source: Bones to Bananas and Bones to Peaches Help!

Hello Mopar! Im trying to add bones to bananas and bones to peaches but i always get this error.
